name: Dates (Soft/Medjool)
properties: Often soaked before use in recipes
benefits: Dates are a whole food natural sweetener that provides fiber along with sweetness, unlike refined sugars. Rich in antioxidants and minerals. When used as a sweetener, dates add nutrition rather than empty calories. The fiber helps moderate blood sugar response compared to refined sugars.
amount: 2 pitted soft dates, soaked for 10 minutes in hot water

quotes: 2 pitted soft dates, soaked for 10 minutes in hot water and then drained
Many popular stone fruits, such as cherries, plums, peaches, nectarines, mangoes and dates, are in season in late summer.
In a food processor or blender, combine the mango, lemon juice, dates and the chia mixture and process until smooth.
